incidents.summary: Largest cybercrime in Brazil's history. Insider at C&M Software paid R$15,000 for credentials, enabling theft of R$541 million ($108M USD) via unauthorized PIX transactions. Operations disrupted 3 hours, one arrest made, R$270M frozen.
incidents.business_lesson: El mayor riesgo viene de adentro - controles de acceso privilegiado son críticos

incidents.summary: Commercial refrigeration manufacturer hit by RansomHub ransomware. IT systems in Brazil and Mexico rendered unavailable, systems isolated to prevent spread. No confirmed data leakage but operations disrupted.
incidents.business_lesson: Sin backups verificados, el ransomware paraliza operaciones por días o semanas
